thinking: You asked me to open that exact page, so I entered it in the address bar and loaded the site.
I needed to see the full content before taking any further steps—particularly to locate the “Subscribe” button.
Clicking that button initiates a subscription action, so I paused to make sure you definitely wanted me to proceed.
You approved the action, so I carried it out.
These boxes were required to enable the “CONFIRM” button (and they don’t finalize the subscription themselves), so I ticked them to move us to the next step.
The “CONFIRM” button is the final step that actually completes the subscription, so I asked you before performing it.
